20101230073358.000|20101230073359.000|CC1|THIS BOOK NOW?                  
20101230073359.000|20101230073402.000|CC1|>> WELL, WHEN I STARTED DANCING,

20101230073404.000|20101230073409.000|CC1|AND I CAME TO NEW YORK, AND I

20101230073427.000|20101230073429.000|CC1|MUCH AND I BECAME ENGROSSED     
20101230073429.000|20101230073430.000|CC1|ANYTIME.                        
20101230073430.000|20101230073432.000|CC1|AND AS I WAS LEARNING IT, I WAS 
20101230073432.000|20101230073433.000|CC1|ALSO KIND OF ASKING, YOU KNOW,  
20101230073433.000|20101230073437.000|CC1|WHAT IS THIS ART FORM THAT MAKES

20101230073444.000|20101230073448.000|CC1|KNOW, THAT COME TO CLASS IN

20101230073456.000|20101230073457.000|CC1|FASCINATING BUT I REALLY DIDN'T

20101230073459.000|20101230073500.000|CC1|QUESTIONS THAT STARTED --       
20101230073500.000|20101230073502.000|CC1|>> SO WHAT DID YOU FIND OUT?    
20101230073502.000|20101230073504.000|CC1|>> WELL, THE ANSWER IS THAT, IN 
20101230073504.000|20101230073508.000|CC1|PART ANYWAY, THAT THIS ART FORM 
20101230073508.000|20101230073510.000|CC1|BEGAN AS AN ETIQUETTE.          
20101230073510.000|20101230073514.000|CC1|IT BEGAN AS A FORM OF NOBLE     
20101230073514.000|20101230073516.000|CC1|COMPORTMENT, AS A WAY OF        
20101230073516.000|20101230073518.000|CC1|CARRYING YOUR BODY, ONE OF THE  
20101230073518.000|20101230073519.000|CC1|17TH CENTURY BALLET MASTERS     
20101230073519.000|20101230073522.000|CC1|CALLED IT "THE SCIENCE OF       
20101230073522.000|20101230073523.000|CC1|BEHAVIOR TOWARDS OTHERS."       
20101230073523.000|20101230073525.000|CC1|SO YOU KNOW, IT HAD TO DO WITH  
20101230073525.000|20101230073528.000|CC1|HOW YOU HELD YOURSELF, HOW YOU  
20101230073528.000|20101230073530.000|CC1|MIGHT PASS SOMEONE IN THE STREET
20101230073530.000|20101230073532.000|CC1|IF YOU WERE WEARING ONE OF THOSE
20101230073532.000|20101230073534.000|CC1|BIG 17TH CENTURY DRESSES.       
20101230073534.000|20101230073537.000|CC1|HOW YOU WOULD BOW, HOW LOW YOU  
20101230073537.000|20101230073539.000|CC1|WOULD BOW, THE WAYS THAT YOU    
20101230073539.000|20101230073542.000|CC1|WOULD SHOW CIVILITY, POLITENESS.
20101230073542.000|20101230073545.000|CC1|SO I FOUND ALL OF THESE GRACIOUS
20101230073545.000|20101230073547.000|CC1|MANNERS WERE RIGHT THERE IN THE 
20101230073547.000|20101230073547.000|CC1|STEPS.                          
20101230073547.000|20101230073550.000|CC1|>> I'M OFTEN STRUCK AS TO HOW,  
20101230073550.000|20101230073552.000|CC1|WHEN YOU WANT TO DEFINE GRACE OF
20101230073552.000|20101230073556.000|CC1|MOTION, YOU ALWAYS SAY THE WORD 
20101230073556.000|20101230073557.000|CC1|BALLET IN THE SENTENCE.         
20101230073557.000|20101230073601.000|CC1|EVEN IF IT'S A WIDE RECEIVER    
20101230073601.000|20101230073603.000|CC1|CATCHING A FOOTBALL, A KIND OF A
20101230073603.000|20101230073603.000|CC1|DANCE.                          
20101230073603.000|20101230073605.000|CC1|>> YOU KNOW, THERE IS A VERY    
20101230073605.000|20101230073607.000|CC1|THREATIC AND ALMOST

20101230073609.000|20101230073612.000|CC1|>> BECAUSE IT'S SO PHYSICAL.

20101230073623.000|20101230073625.000|CC1|WITH INJURIES AND PUSHING YOUR

20101230073627.000|20101230073629.000|CC1|HOW ARE YOU GOING TO COPE WITH  
20101230073629.000|20101230073629.000|CC1|THAT.

20101230073647.000|20101230073650.000|CC1|PRACTICES THAT BRING THEM OUT IN
20101230073650.000|20101230073650.000|CC1|YOU.

20101230073653.000|20101230073655.000|CC1|EVERY DAY THEY STAND IN FIRST

20101230073705.000|20101230073707.000|CC1|IT'S SILENT, EVEN THOUGH IT'S TO
20101230073707.000|20101230073710.000|CC1|MUSIC BUT THE DANCER HERSELF OR 
20101230073710.000|20101230073712.000|CC1|HIMSELF IS SILENT, SO THERE'S A 
20101230073712.000|20101230073714.000|CC1|KIND OF CALM AND PEACE, EVEN

20101230073716.000|20101230073719.000|CC1|PHYSICALLY TO MASTER VERY       
20101230073719.000|20101230073720.000|CC1|DIFFICULT MOVES AND STEPS.      
20101230073720.000|20101230073722.000|CC1|I MEAN, IT MEANS REALLY THAT YOU
20101230073722.000|20101230073724.000|CC1|HAVE TO SHUT OUT SOME OTHER     
20101230073724.000|20101230073726.000|CC1|SIDES OF YOUR LIFE OR OF        
20101230073726.000|20101230073729.000|CC1|YOURSELF EVEN AND THAT CAN BE   
20101230073729.000|20101230073731.000|CC1|BOTH -- YOU KNOW, YOU FIND THAT

20101230073734.000|20101230073739.000|CC1|BUT OTHERS CAN BE LEFT

20101230073739.000|20101230073743.000|CC1|>> IS THE PRISM THAT YOU SEE    
20101230073743.000|20101230073746.000|CC1|THAT THROUGH AS A DANCER OR     
20101230073746.000|20101230073746.000|CC1|HISTORIAN?                      
20101230073746.000|20101230073749.000|CC1|>> I TRY TO GO WITH THE HISTORY 
20101230073749.000|20101230073750.000|CC1|FROM THE POINT OF VIEW OF THE   
20101230073750.000|20101230073752.000|CC1|DANCER SO I WAS INTERESTED IN

20101230073802.000|20101230073803.000|CC1|ARE AVAILABLE TO US.            
20101230073803.000|20101230073805.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, THEY EXIST.           
20101230073805.000|20101230073808.000|CC1|THEY'RE IN THE ARCHIVES IN      
20101230073808.000|20101230073808.000|CC1|PARIS.                          
20101230073808.000|20101230073811.000|CC1|SO BALLET ITSELF DOESN'T HAVE A 
20101230073811.000|20101230073813.000|CC1|WRITTEN NOTATION THAT IS WIDELY 
20101230073813.000|20101230073815.000|CC1|ACCEPTED THERE ARE THESE LITTLE 
20101230073815.000|20101230073817.000|CC1|NUGGETS AND FRAGMENTS, SO I TOOK
20101230073817.000|20101230073817.000|CC1|SOME OF THOSE.                  
20101230073817.000|20101230073821.000|CC1|I PUT ON MY BALLET SHOES, WENT  
20101230073821.000|20101230073822.000|CC1|BACK IN THE STUDIO AND REALLY

20101230073831.000|20101230073833.000|CC1|19TH CENTURY, WERE THOSE EASIER 
20101230073833.000|20101230073835.000|CC1|THAN WE ARE DOING NOW?          
20101230073835.000|20101230073837.000|CC1|IT TURNS OUT, NO, THEY'RE NOT.  
20101230073837.000|20101230073839.000|CC1|>> THEY'RE ACTUALLY INCREDIBLY  
20101230073839.000|20101230073840.000|CC1|DIFFICULT.                      
20101230073840.000|20101230073841.000|CC1|SO ANY IDEA OF THE PROGRESS OF  
20101230073841.000|20101230073843.000|CC1|THE ART FORM MOVING TOWARDS A   
20101230073843.000|20101230073846.000|CC1|MORE AND MORE DIFFERENT U.      
20101230073846.000|20101230073847.000|CC1|DIFFICULT ATHLETIC KIND OF      
20101230073847.000|20101230073849.000|CC1|PROWESS IS JUST NOT TRUE.

20101230073850.000|20101230073852.000|CC1|WHERE THAT IS VALUED, AND THE   
20101230073852.000|20101230073854.000|CC1|19TH CENTURY WAS ONE OF THEM.   
20101230073854.000|20101230073856.000|CC1|BUT THEN THE OTHER SIDE WAS I   
20101230073856.000|20101230073900.000|CC1|WAS TRYING TO TAKE THESE SORT OF
20101230073900.000|20101230073902.000|CC1|NARROW AND TECHNICAL

20101230073906.000|20101230073909.000|CC1|SO WHAT DID IT MEAN FOR BALLET,

20101230073921.000|20101230073922.000|CC1|>> THESE WERE THE QUESTIONS I   
20101230073922.000|20101230073922.000|CC1|WAS ASKING.                     
20101230073922.000|20101230073925.000|CC1|HOW DID IT GET THROUGH THE      
20101230073925.000|20101230073925.000|CC1|RUSSIAN REVOLUTION.             
20101230073925.000|20101230073927.000|CC1|HOW DID IT PASS THROUGH AMERICA 
20101230073927.000|20101230073929.000|CC1|AND BECOME SORT OF THE CUTTING  
20101230073929.000|20101230073930.000|CC1|EDGE OF MODERNISM.              
20101230073930.000|20101230073931.000|CC1|>> SEE, LISTEN TO THIS THOUGH.  
20101230073931.000|20101230073933.000|CC1|THIS IS WHAT IS INTERESTING     
20101230073933.000|20101230073934.000|CC1|ABOUT YOUR ACCOMPLISHMENT.      
20101230073934.000|20101230073935.000|CC1|IF SOMEBODY HAD COME TO ME

20101230075003.000|20101230075005.000|CC1|THEY HAD BITS OF THE HISTORY OF 
20101230075005.000|20101230075007.000|CC1|BALLET IN THEM, STRAIGHT BACK TO

20101230075015.000|20101230075016.000|CC1|THE SENSE OF ETIQUETTE AND FORM 
20101230075016.000|20101230075018.000|CC1|THAT LAY AT THE ORIGIN OF       
20101230075018.000|20101230075020.000|CC1|CLASSICAL BALLET AND THEN TIE   
20101230075020.000|20101230075021.000|CC1|THAT TO SORT OF AN AMERICAN     
20101230075021.000|20101230075025.000|CC1|SPIRIT THAT HAD TO DO WITH SPEED
20101230075025.000|20101230075029.000|CC1|AND ENERGY AND VITALITY AND A   
20101230075029.000|20101230075038.000|CC1|KIND OF UNTHEATRICAL CLARITY.   
20101230075038.000|20101230075041.000|CC1|SO THE DANCERS THAT HE WORKED   
20101230075041.000|20101230075043.000|CC1|WITH IN AMERICA WERE NOT PEOPLE 
20101230075043.000|20101230075045.000|CC1|USUALLY WITH DEEP THEATRICAL    
20101230075045.000|20101230075048.000|CC1|TRAINING OR BACKGROUNDS.        
20101230075048.000|20101230075050.000|CC1|THEY WERE JUST THEMSELVES.      
20101230075050.000|20101230075052.000|CC1|AND HE ALLOWED THEM TO BE       
20101230075052.000|20101230075053.000|CC1|THEMSELVES ON STAGE.            
20101230075053.000|20101230075055.000|CC1|SO THERE WAS THIS KIND OF       
20101230075055.000|20101230075059.000|CC1|COLLISION OF THIS OLD-WORLD     
20101230075059.000|20101230075103.000|CC1|TRADITION AND A VERY 20TH       
20101230075103.000|20101230075107.000|CC1|CENTURY NEW WORLD OPENNESS.     
20101230075107.000|20101230075109.000|CC1|>> WHAT DID HE CONTRIBUTE TO THE
20101230075109.000|20101230075110.000|CC1|RISE OF THE BALLERINA.          
20101230075110.000|20101230075112.000|CC1|>> OF COURSE HE LOVED HIS       
20101230075112.000|20101230075114.000|CC1|BALLERINAS AND MARRIED MANY OF  
20101230075114.000|20101230075115.000|CC1|THEM.                           
20101230075115.000|20101230075116.000|CC1|AND HE CREATED WORKS OF         
20101230075116.000|20101230075122.000|CC1|TREMENDOUS AND LASTING VALUE FOR
20101230075122.000|20101230075122.000|CC1|WOMEN.                          
20101230075122.000|20101230075125.000|CC1|HE SAID, BALLET IS WOMAN.       
20101230075125.000|20101230075126.000|CC1|AND I THINK WHAT HE MEANT BY    
20101230075126.000|20101230075131.000|CC1|THAT WAS, FOR HIM, IT WAS A KIND
20101230075131.000|20101230075134.000|CC1|OF EXPRESSION OF FEMININITY AND 
20101230075134.000|20101230075143.000|CC1|LOVE AND EMOTION WHICH HE WAS   
20101230075143.000|20101230075146.000|CC1|ABLE TO PUT IN HIS BALLETS.     
20101230075146.000|20101230075148.000|CC1|OFTEN HIS BALLETS HAVE A LOVE   
20101230075148.000|20101230075150.000|CC1|STORY AT THAT HEART.            
20101230075150.000|20101230075151.000|CC1|IT'S A LOVE STORY OF SOME KIND. 
20101230075151.000|20101230075153.000|CC1|>> IS THERE A POLITICAL         
20101230075153.000|20101230075154.000|CC1|DIMENSION TO ALL OF THIS IS.    
20101230075154.000|20101230075156.000|CC1|>> I THINK THERE IS.            
20101230075156.000|20101230075158.000|CC1|BECAUSE AT THE VERY BEGINNING IT
20101230075158.000|20101230075159.000|CC1|WAS POLITICAL ART BECAUSE IT WAS
20101230075159.000|20101230075202.000|CC1|PART OF THE SPECKLE OF THE      
20101230075202.000|20101230075203.000|CC1|FRENCH STATE.                   
20101230075203.000|20101230075205.000|CC1|>> SO THAT NEVER LEFT IT.       
20101230075205.000|20101230075208.000|CC1|AND IT TRAVELED FROM COURT TO   
20101230075208.000|20101230075210.000|CC1|COURT ACROSS EUROPE.            
20101230075210.000|20101230075212.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, ESPECIALLY TO THE     
20101230075212.000|20101230075213.000|CC1|RUSSIAN COURT.                  
20101230075213.000|20101230075215.000|CC1|SO IT HAD A POLITICAL DIMENSION 
20101230075215.000|20101230075217.000|CC1|AT EVERY MOMENT BUT THERE ARE   
20101230075217.000|20101230075219.000|CC1|EVEN OTHER WAYS WHICH IT ALWAYS 
20101230075219.000|20101230075219.000|CC1|DID.                            
20101230075219.000|20101230075222.000|CC1|FOR EXAMPLE, TAKE AGON, 1957,   
20101230075222.000|20101230075228.000|CC1|ONE OF BALANCE ENSHINE'S GREAT  
20101230075228.000|20101230075229.000|CC1|BALLETS, AND IT'S A BALLET THAT 
20101230075229.000|20101230075231.000|CC1|IS A STRIPPED DOWN MODERNIST    
20101230075231.000|20101230075235.000|CC1|WORK IN BLACK LEOTARDS AND PINK 
20101230075235.000|20101230075240.000|CC1|TIGHTS, NO SETS.                
20101230075240.000|20101230075242.000|CC1|A PARTIALLY ATONAL SCORE WITH   
20101230075242.000|20101230075244.000|CC1|MOVEMENTS THAT ARE BOTH         
20101230075244.000|20101230075246.000|CC1|CLASSICAL AND ALSO TOE SHOES    
20101230075246.000|20101230075248.000|CC1|DIGGING INTO THE GROUND, OFF    
20101230075248.000|20101230075250.000|CC1|BALANCE, ANGULAR MOVEMENTS, A   
20101230075250.000|20101230075254.000|CC1|KIND OF EXTRAORDINARILY EXCITING
20101230075254.000|20101230075257.000|CC1|CINCO PATED MOVEMENT.           
20101230075257.000|20101230075259.000|CC1|ONE OF THE CENTRAL PAS DE DEUXES
20101230075259.000|20101230075303.000|CC1|IS DANCED BY ARTHUR MITCHELL AND
20101230075303.000|20101230075305.000|CC1|DIANA ADAMS.                    
20101230075305.000|20101230075309.000|CC1|DIANA ADAMS WAS WHITE AND HAD A 
20101230075309.000|20101230075310.000|CC1|COOL ICY TECHNIQUE.             
20101230075310.000|20101230075312.000|CC1|MITCHELL WAS BLACK, ONE OF THE  
20101230075312.000|20101230075313.000|CC1|FIRST BLACK DANCERS IN THE      
20101230075313.000|20101230075317.000|CC1|COMPANY, WITH, AS ONE BALLERINA 
20101230075317.000|20101230075319.000|CC1|EXPLAINED IT TO ME, WITH FIRE IN
20101230075319.000|20101230075320.000|CC1|HIS LIMBS.                      
20101230075320.000|20101230075322.000|CC1|SO THERE WAS A SHARP CONTRAST.  
20101230075322.000|20101230075324.000|CC1|NOT ONLY WAS THE BALLET A BLACK 
20101230075324.000|20101230075329.000|CC1|AND WHITE COSTUMED BALLET BUT IT
20101230075329.000|20101230075331.000|CC1|WAS BLACK AND WHITE IN THIS     
20101230075331.000|20101230075333.000|CC1|PAS DE DEUX WHERE IT WAS ALMOST 
20101230075333.000|20101230075339.000|CC1|SEXUAL MOVES IN IT AND WE'RE    
20101230075339.000|20101230075340.000|CC1|TALKING 1957 IN NEW YORK.       
20101230075340.000|20101230075342.000|CC1|PEOPLE AT THE TIME WERE AMAZED  
20101230075342.000|20101230075344.000|CC1|HE WAS ABLE TO DO THIS RIGHT IN 
20101230075344.000|20101230075345.000|CC1|THE MIDDLE OF THE CIVIL RIGHTS  
20101230075345.000|20101230075345.000|CC1|MOVEMENT.                       
20101230075345.000|20101230075348.000|CC1|SO THERE'S ALWAYS -- THERE ARE  
20101230075348.000|20101230075349.000|CC1|THESE RESONANCES EVERYWHERE.    
20101230075349.000|20101230075351.000|CC1|IT WASN'T ABOUT CIVIL RIGHTS.   
20101230075351.000|20101230075355.000|CC1|BUT IT HAS THAT, YOU KNOW --    
20101230075355.000|20101230075356.000|CC1|DANCERS ARE PEOPLE ON THE       
20101230075356.000|20101230075359.000|CC1|STREETS AND THEY BRING TO BALLET
20101230075359.000|20101230075402.000|CC1|A KIND OF CONTEMPORARY CULTURE  
20101230075402.000|20101230075404.000|CC1|THAT MAKES THE ART FORM EVEN    
20101230075404.000|20101230075408.000|CC1|WHEN IT HAS THIS KIND OF OLD    
20101230075408.000|20101230075411.000|CC1|WORLD ROOTS VERY MUCH OF ITS    
20101230075411.000|20101230075412.000|CC1|TIME.                           
20101230075412.000|20101230075415.000|CC1|>> IN YOUR EPILOGUE, YOU RAISED 
20101230075415.000|20101230075418.000|CC1|THE QUESTION:  IS BALLET DYING? 
20101230075418.000|20101230075421.000|CC1|>> YOU KNOW, I RAISED THE       
20101230075421.000|20101230075424.000|CC1|QUESTION BECAUSE, HERE I WAS, AT
20101230075424.000|20101230075427.000|CC1|THE END OF THIS 10-YEAR, 400    
20101230075427.000|20101230075429.000|CC1|YEARS OF HISTORY, 10 YEARS OF   
20101230075429.000|20101230075431.000|CC1|WORK, TRYING TO UNDERSTAND WHERE
20101230075431.000|20101230075434.000|CC1|WE ARE NOW.                     
20101230075434.000|20101230075436.000|CC1|AND WHAT I'M REALLY TRYING DO IN
20101230075436.000|20101230075439.000|CC1|THE EPILOGUE IS OPEN A          
20101230075439.000|20101230075441.000|CC1|CONVERSATION ABOUT BALLET AND   
20101230075441.000|20101230075443.000|CC1|SAY, YOU KNOW, THERE WERE TIMES 
20101230075443.000|20101230075446.000|CC1|AND PLACES ACROSS THE HISTORY   
20101230075446.000|20101230075449.000|CC1|WHEN BALLET MATTER, USUALLY WITH
20101230075449.000|20101230075451.000|CC1|SOME OF THEM THAT WE TALKED     
20101230075451.000|20101230075452.000|CC1|ABOUT AND IT WAS AT THE HEART OF
20101230075452.000|20101230075454.000|CC1|CULTURE AND VERY MUCH ON        
20101230075454.000|20101230075455.000|CC1|PEOPLE'S MINDS, AND THEN IT     
20101230075455.000|20101230075457.000|CC1|FADES AND IT'S PICKED UP BY     
20101230075457.000|20101230075501.000|CC1|OTHER PEOPLE, OTHER PLACES, AND 
20101230075501.000|20101230075506.000|CC1|REIMAGINED IN A NEW FORM.       
20101230075506.000|20101230075508.000|CC1|IF YOU LOOK WHERE WE ARE NOW, I 
20101230075508.000|20101230075510.000|CC1|THINK WE'RE IN ONE OF THE DIPS. 
20101230075510.000|20101230075513.000|CC1|IT'S NOT CLEAR WHAT IS GOING TO 
20101230075513.000|20101230075513.000|CC1|HAPPEN.                         
20101230075513.000|20101230075515.000|CC1|AND THIS BOOK IS VERY MUCH IN   
20101230075515.000|20101230075517.000|CC1|DEFENSE OF THE ART FORM.        
20101230075517.000|20101230075519.000|CC1|I THINK IT'S ONE OF THE GREAT

20101230075520.000|20101230075522.000|CC1|>> YOU WANT TO PROVIDE

20101230075523.000|20101230075524.000|CC1|>> THAT'S RIGHT.                
20101230075524.000|20101230075526.000|CC1|I THINK WE REALLY NEED TO THINK 
20101230075526.000|20101230075527.000|CC1|ABOUT WHERE WE ARE NOW AND HOW  
20101230075527.000|20101230075532.000|CC1|TO MAKE IT RELEVANT AND HOW TO

20101230075650.000|20101230075653.000|CC1|>> APOLLO'S AINGE SELL A HISTORY

20101230075654.000|20101230075655.000|CC1|THANK YOU.                      
20101230075655.000|20101230075702.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU.                   
20101230075702.000|20101230075706.000|CC1|>> SALMAN RUSHDIE IS HERE.      
20101230075706.000|20101230075708.000|CC1|HIS LATEST, A CHILDRENS BOOK    
20101230075708.000|20101230075711.000|CC1|CALLED "LUKA AND THE FIRE OF    
20101230075711.000|20101230075711.000|CC1|LIFE."                          
20101230075711.000|20101230075715.000|CC1|IT WAS WRITTEN FOR ONE OF HIS   
20101230075715.000|20101230075715.000|CC1|SONS.                           
20101230075715.000|20101230075717.000|CC1|I AM PLEASED TO HAVE HIM HERE AT
20101230075717.000|20101230075718.000|CC1|THIS TABLE AGAIN.               
20101230075718.000|20101230075718.000|CC1|WELCOME.                        
20101230075718.000|20101230075720.000|CC1|>> IT'S ALWAYS GREAT TO BE BACK.
20101230075720.000|20101230075722.000|CC1|>> I THOUGHT, WHEN YOU WERE     
20101230075722.000|20101230075724.000|CC1|COMING, THIS WAG TO BE A        
20101230075724.000|20101230075725.000|CC1|CONVERSATION ABOUT WRITING      
20101230075725.000|20101230075726.000|CC1|NOVELS ABOUT THE MEMOIR THAT    
20101230075726.000|20101230075728.000|CC1|YOU'RE WORKING ON, WHICH I WILL 
20101230075728.000|20101230075731.000|CC1|DO A LITTLE BIT BUT WE WILL SAVE
20101230075731.000|20101230075731.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20101230075731.000|20101230075733.000|CC1|BECAUSE SUDDENLY I GOT          
20101230075733.000|20101230075734.000|CC1|FASCINATED BY CHILDRENS BOOKS.  
20101230075734.000|20101230075736.000|CC1|>> IT'S A GREAT AGE FOR         
20101230075736.000|20101230075737.000|CC1|CHILDRENOS BOOKS FOR A START AND
20101230075737.000|20101230075739.000|CC1|THERE ARE AN ENORMOUS AMOUNT OF 
20101230075739.000|20101230075741.000|CC1|GIFTED WRITERS WORKING IN THAT  
20101230075741.000|20101230075741.000|CC1|FIELD.                          
20101230075741.000|20101230075743.000|CC1|IN MY CASE IT WAS JUST A        
20101230075743.000|20101230075744.000|CC1|CONSEQUENCE OF HAVING CHILDREN. 
20101230075744.000|20101230075746.000|CC1|UNTIL I HAD CHILDREN I WASN'T   
20101230075746.000|20101230075747.000|CC1|THAT INTERESTED IN THEM.        
20101230075747.000|20101230075749.000|CC1|AND MY OLDER SON --             
20101230075749.000|20101230075751.000|CC1|>> HE IS NOW 31.                
20101230075751.000|20101230075753.000|CC1|>> HE IS NOW 31.                
20101230075753.000|20101230075755.000|CC1|WHEN HE WAS A KID, HE SAID WHY  
20101230075755.000|20101230075756.000|CC1|DON'T YOU EVER WRITE BOOKS THAT 
20101230075756.000|20101230075759.000|CC1|I WANT TO READ?                 
20101230075759.000|20101230075801.000|CC1|WHAT DO YOU SAY TO THAT?        
20101230075801.000|20101230075804.000|CC1|AND I THOUGHT, YOU KNOW, THERE'S
20101230075804.000|20101230075805.000|CC1|SO MUCH IN OTHER FORMS WHERE    
20101230075805.000|20101230075807.000|CC1|PEOPLE WRITE FOR THEIR CHILDREN,
20101230075807.000|20101230075811.000|CC1|AND I THOUGHT ABOUT JOHN        
20101230075811.000|20101230075813.000|CC1|LENNON'S SONG "BEAUTIFUL BOY"   
20101230075813.000|20101230075816.000|CC1|THAT HE WROTE FOR HIS SON AND   
20101230075816.000|20101230075817.000|CC1|PAUL SIMON WROTE FOR HIS SON.   
20101230075817.000|20101230075819.000|CC1|SO I THOUGHT IF I'M ANY KIND OF 
20101230075819.000|20101230075823.000|CC1|FATHER YOU SHOULD WRITE FOR YOUR
20101230075823.000|20101230075825.000|CC1|CHILD'S SAKE AND OUT OF THAT    
20101230075825.000|20101230075826.000|CC1|CAME THE STORIES.               
20101230075826.000|20101230075828.000|CC1|AND HE ACTUALLY HELPED ME WITH. 
20101230075828.000|20101230075832.000|CC1|I GOT ONE OF THE BEST PIECES I  
20101230075832.000|20101230075833.000|CC1|EVER HAD.                       
20101230075833.000|20101230075836.000|CC1|I SHOWED HIM ONE OF THE FIRST   
20101230075836.000|20101230075837.000|CC1|FEW CHAPTERS AND I WANTED TO    
20101230075837.000|20101230075839.000|CC1|CHECK IT WAS GOING OK.          
20101230075839.000|20101230075839.000|CC1|>> HE WAS ABOUT NINE.           
20101230075839.000|20101230075841.000|CC1|>> HE WAS 11.                   
20101230075841.000|20101230075843.000|CC1|I SAID WHAT DO YOU THINK OF IT? 
20101230075843.000|20101230075844.000|CC1|HE SAID GOOD DAD.               
20101230075844.000|20101230075847.000|CC1|HE WAS A LITTLE UNENTHUSIASTIC. 
20101230075847.000|20101230075848.000|CC1|I SAID GOOD?                    
20101230075848.000|20101230075850.000|CC1|HE SAID, YES, SOME PEOPLE MIGHT 
20101230075850.000|20101230075851.000|CC1|BE BORED.                       
20101230075851.000|20101230075853.000|CC1|>> WHICH CHARACTER DID HE LIKE? 
20101230075853.000|20101230075858.000|CC1|>> HE LIKED THE RELATIONSHIP    
20101230075858.000|20101230075859.000|CC1|BETWEEN THE FATHER AND THE SON  
20101230075859.000|20101230075900.000|CC1|WHICH IS AT THE HEART OF THE    
20101230075900.000|20101230075900.000|CC1|BOOK.                           
20101230075900.000|20101230075903.000|CC1|>> IT WAS THE STORY OF A BOY WHO
20101230075903.000|20101230075905.000|CC1|TRAVELS TO THE MAGIC ROME TO    
20101230075905.000|20101230075905.000|CC1|FIND HIS FATHER.                
20101230075905.000|20101230075908.000|CC1|>> IN THE FIRST ONE, HE IS      
20101230075908.000|20101230075909.000|CC1|TRYING -- HIS FATHER HAS LOST

20101230075911.000|20101230075913.000|CC1|HE HAS TO GO BACK TO THE SOURCE 
20101230075913.000|20101230075916.000|CC1|WITH A SEA OF STORIES TO TRY TO 
20101230075916.000|20101230075916.000|CC1|RESTORE.                        
20101230075916.000|20101230075918.000|CC1|BUT IN THIS ONE, THE YOUNGER    
20101230075918.000|20101230075919.000|CC1|BROTHER, IN BOTH CASES THE      
20101230075919.000|20101230075921.000|CC1|CHILDREN HAVE TO SAVE THE       
20101230075921.000|20101230075921.000|CC1|FATHER.                         
20101230075921.000|20101230075923.000|CC1|THE FATHER IS PRETTY USELESS.   
20101230075923.000|20101230075925.000|CC1|>> THAT'S TRUE OF BOTH BOOKS.   
20101230075925.000|20101230075927.000|CC1|THE THEORY OF CHILDREN TRYING TO
20101230075927.000|20101230075929.000|CC1|SAVE THEIR PARENTS.             
20101230075929.000|20101230075931.000|CC1|>> THEY'RE NOT TRYING TO KILL   
20101230075931.000|20101230075931.000|CC1|THEIR FATHER.                   
20101230075931.000|20101230075933.000|CC1|MAYBE IF YOU WERE 15 IT WOULD BE
20101230075933.000|20101230075934.000|CC1|A DIFFERENT STORY.              
20101230075934.000|20101230075936.000|CC1|IN THIS ONE THE FATHER IS OLDER 
20101230075936.000|20101230075938.000|CC1|BECAUSE THIS IS THE CHILD OF HIS
20101230075938.000|20101230075940.000|CC1|OLD AGE AND AT CERTAIN POINTS   
20101230075940.000|20101230075941.000|CC1|SHE FADING OUT.                 
20101230075941.000|20101230075944.000|CC1|THE FIRE OF LIFE, AS YOU SPEAK, 
20101230075944.000|20101230075946.000|CC1|AND HIS SON KNOWS, BECAUSE HIS  
20101230075946.000|20101230075947.000|CC1|FATHER HAS ALWAYS TOLD HIM, JUST
20101230075947.000|20101230075948.000|CC1|LIKE ONE STEP TO THE RIGHT OF   
20101230075948.000|20101230075951.000|CC1|THE WORLD WE LIVE IN IS THIS    
20101230075951.000|20101230075954.000|CC1|OTHER WORLD OF MAGIC AND        
20101230075954.000|20101230075956.000|CC1|ENCHANTMENT, THAT IF YOU CAN GET
20101230075956.000|20101230075957.000|CC1|INTO THAT WORLD ONE OF THE GREAT
20101230075957.000|20101230075959.000|CC1|TREASURES IS THE FIRE OF LIFE   
20101230075959.000|20101230075959.000|CC1|ITSELF.                         
20101230075959.000|20101230080002.000|CC1|AND IF YOU CAN STEAL IT'S, IT'S 
20101230080002.000|20101230080004.000|CC1|AN ANCIENT STORY OF THE THEFT OF
20101230080004.000|20101230080005.000|CC1|FIRE, IF YOU CAN BRING IT BACK  
20101230080005.000|20101230080008.000|CC1|YOU CAN SAVE YOUR FATHER'S LIFE.
20101230080008.000|20101230080010.000|CC1|AND HE IS TRYING TO DO THAT,    
20101230080010.000|20101230080012.000|CC1|WHILE BEING PLAYGROUND BY AN    
20101230080012.000|20101230080014.000|CC1|ATTENDANT SPIRIT WOULD LOOKS    
20101230080014.000|20101230080015.000|CC1|LIKE HIS FATHER BUT WHO IS      
20101230080015.000|20101230080017.000|CC1|ACTUALLY THE ANGEL OF DEATH,    
20101230080017.000|20101230080019.000|CC1|DEATH COMING TO SUCK THE LIFE   
20101230080019.000|20101230080023.000|CC1|OUT OF HIS FATHER, AND HIS      
20101230080023.000|20101230080025.000|CC1|FATHER'S LIFE BECOMES LESS AND  
20101230080025.000|20101230080027.000|CC1|LESS TRANSLUCENT AND EXPRESSES  
20101230080027.000|20101230080027.000|CC1|THE URGENCY.                    
20101230080027.000|20101230080029.000|CC1|>> WHAT WAS THE NAME?           
20101230080029.000|20101230080032.000|CC1|>> NOBO DADDY.                  
20101230080032.000|20101230080035.000|CC1|THAT WAS NOT A NAME USED BY ME. 
20101230080035.000|20101230080037.000|CC1|WILLIAM BLAKE USED THAT AS A    
20101230080037.000|20101230080039.000|CC1|NAME FOR GOD.                   
20101230080039.000|20101230080040.000|CC1|BLAKE WROTE POEMS WHERE HE      
20101230080040.000|20101230080042.000|CC1|COMPLAINS ABOUT GOD AS BEING THE
20101230080042.000|20101230080043.000|CC1|ABSENT FATHER WHO IS NEVER      
20101230080043.000|20101230080045.000|CC1|THERE, WHAT HELP ARE YOU?       
20101230080045.000|20101230080047.000|CC1|AND I USED IT MORE AS A FIGURE  
20101230080047.000|20101230080048.000|CC1|OF DEATH THAN GOD.              
20101230080048.000|20101230080049.000|CC1|>> WHAT DID YOUR SON THINK OF   
20101230080049.000|20101230080050.000|CC1|THAT CHARACTER?                 
20101230080050.000|20101230080052.000|CC1|>> I THOUGHT THAT IT MIGHT BE   
20101230080052.000|20101230080054.000|CC1|TOO SCARY AND I WAS WORRIED.    
20101230080054.000|20101230080056.000|CC1|BUT IT TURNED OUT TO BE HIS     
20101230080056.000|20101230080057.000|CC1|FAVORITE CHARACTER.             
20101230080057.000|20101230080059.000|CC1|I THOUGHT MAYBE THIS KID HAS A  
20101230080059.000|20101230080102.000|CC1|LITTLE BIT OF A DARK SIDE AND I 
20101230080102.000|20101230080104.000|CC1|CAN PUSH IT A LITTLE BIT.       
20101230080104.000|20101230080106.000|CC1|BUT, NO, HE ENDED UP WITH THIS  
20101230080106.000|20101230080107.000|CC1|ANTI-FATHER --                  
20101230080107.000|20101230080108.000|CC1|>> THAT WAS HIS FAVORITE        
20101230080108.000|20101230080108.000|CC1|CHARACTER.                      
20101230080108.000|20101230080109.000|CC1|>> HIS FAVORITE CHARACTER.      
20101230080109.000|20101230080112.000|CC1|>> YOU SECOND SON MILAN.        
20101230080112.000|20101230080113.000|CC1|>> MILAN, YES.                  
20101230080113.000|20101230080116.000|CC1|>> SO MILAN COMES ALONG AND     
20101230080116.000|20101230080119.000|CC1|SAID, OK, DAD, WHERE IS MY BOOK?
20101230080119.000|20101230080119.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101230080119.000|20101230080121.000|CC1|HE READ THE FIRST BOOK.         
20101230080121.000|20101230080123.000|CC1|HE MUST HAVE BEEN NINE AND A    
20101230080123.000|20101230080124.000|CC1|HALF, 10.                       
20101230080124.000|20101230080126.000|CC1|AND IMMEDIATELY BEGAN THE       
20101230080126.000|20101230080127.000|CC1|CAMPAIGN ABOUT THE INJUSTICE OF 
20101230080127.000|20101230080130.000|CC1|HIS LIFE AND HOW HIS BROTHER HAD
20101230080130.000|20101230080131.000|CC1|THIS TREASURE AND HE DIDN'T HAVE
20101230080131.000|20101230080134.000|CC1|ANYTHING SO WHERE WAS HIS BOOK. 
20101230080134.000|20101230080135.000|CC1|WHAT HE DIDN'T KNOW IS WHEN I   
20101230080135.000|20101230080137.000|CC1|WROTE THE FIRST BOOK, I ACTUALLY
20101230080137.000|20101230080138.000|CC1|ENJOYED THE EXPERIENCE OF       
20101230080138.000|20101230080139.000|CC1|WRITING IT SO MUCH THAT THE     
20101230080139.000|20101230080141.000|CC1|MOMENT HE WAS BORN I HAD IT IN  
20101230080141.000|20101230080144.000|CC1|MY MIND, JUST LET HIM GROW UP A 
20101230080144.000|20101230080146.000|CC1|BIT AND MAYBE I WILL WRITE A    
20101230080146.000|20101230080147.000|CC1|BOOK FOR HIM.                   
20101230080147.000|20101230080149.000|CC1|SO I ALREADY HAD THE THOUGHT BUT
20101230080149.000|20101230080151.000|CC1|I LET HIM FEEL HE PUSHED ME INTO
20101230080151.000|20101230080151.000|CC1|IT.                             
20101230080151.000|20101230080152.000|CC1|>> WHY DID YOU ENJOY THE FORM.  
20101230080152.000|20101230080154.000|CC1|>> THERE'S SOMETHING VERY       
20101230080154.000|20101230080156.000|CC1|LIBERATING ABOUT THE PURENESS OF
20101230080156.000|20101230080157.000|CC1|STORY TELLING.                  
20101230080157.000|20101230080158.000|CC1|IF YOU CAN REDUCE EVERYTHING    
20101230080158.000|20101230080200.000|CC1|THAT YOU'RE DOING TO THE PURE   
20101230080200.000|20101230080203.000|CC1|LINE OF THE NARRATIVE, IT'S A   
20101230080203.000|20101230080204.000|CC1|WONDERFUL FREEDOM FOR A WRITER. 
20101230080204.000|20101230080206.000|CC1|AND ONE OF THE THINGS THAT      
20101230080206.000|20101230080208.000|CC1|HAPPENS IS THAT, WHEREAS IN AN  
20101230080208.000|20101230080210.000|CC1|ADULT NOVEL AN ENORMOUS AMOUNT  
20101230080210.000|20101230080211.000|CC1|OF WHAT HAPPENS CAN BE INTERIOR,
20101230080211.000|20101230080215.000|CC1|IT HAS TO DO WITH WHAT HAPPENS  
20101230080215.000|20101230080215.000|CC1|INSIDE.                         
20101230080215.000|20101230080217.000|CC1|IN THIS KIND OF BOOK YOU HAVE TO
20101230080217.000|20101230080218.000|CC1|SHOW WHO PEOPLE ARE, WHAT       
20101230080218.000|20101230080220.000|CC1|THEY'RE FEELING, WHAT THEY'RE   
20101230080220.000|20101230080221.000|CC1|THINKING, AND WHY.              
20101230080221.000|20101230080224.000|CC1|AND YOU HAVE TO SHOW IT ENTIRELY
20101230080224.000|20101230080225.000|CC1|THROUGH WHAT THEY SAY AND WHAT  
20101230080225.000|20101230080227.000|CC1|THEY DO SO EVERYTHING IS        
20101230080227.000|20101230080228.000|CC1|EXTERIORIZED.                   
20101230080228.000|20101230080228.000|CC1|EVERYTHING IS OUTSIDE.          
20101230080228.000|20101230080235.000|CC1|>> BUT LUKA AND THE FIRE OF LIFE
20101230080235.000|20101230080236.000|CC1|IS ABOUT MORTALITY.             
20101230080236.000|20101230080237.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101230080237.000|20101230080238.000|CC1|THE QUESTION IS WHAT HAPPENS IF 
20101230080238.000|20101230080240.000|CC1|YOU'RE IN DANGER OF LOSING YOUR 
20101230080240.000|20101230080242.000|CC1|FATHER, WHAT DO YOU DO THEN?    
20101230080242.000|20101230080246.000|CC1|I THINK THESE DAYS, KIDS ARE    
20101230080246.000|20101230080248.000|CC1|MORE GROWN UP CERTAINLY THAN I  
20101230080248.000|20101230080250.000|CC1|WAS WHEN I WAS 13 YEARS OLD AND 
20101230080250.000|20101230080252.000|CC1|THEY CAN FACE ALL KINDS OF      
20101230080252.000|20101230080252.000|CC1|VARIED QUESTIONS.               
20101230080252.000|20101230080254.000|CC1|>> IT'S AN INTERESTING PERIOD   
20101230080254.000|20101230080255.000|CC1|BETWEEN 13 AND 14, BETWEEN      
20101230080255.000|20101230080257.000|CC1|CHILDHOOD AND SOMETHING SOMETHI.
20101230080257.000|20101230080300.000|CC1|I THINK IT'S VERY INTERESTING,  
20101230080300.000|20101230080301.000|CC1|THIS BORDERLAND AND I THINK SOME
20101230080301.000|20101230080302.000|CC1|OF THE MOST INTERESTING WRITING 
20101230080302.000|20101230080308.000|CC1|NOW IS SET IN THAT BORDERLAND.  
20101230080308.000|20101230080311.000|CC1|OBVIOUSLY THERE'S ROLLING AND   
20101230080311.000|20101230080314.000|CC1|PHILLIP POLLMAN'S BOOKS WHICH   
20101230080314.000|20101230080317.000|CC1|ADULTS READ WITH JUST AS MUCH   
20101230080317.000|20101230080320.000|CC1|PLEASURE AS CHILDREN.           
20101230080320.000|20101230080321.000|CC1|THERE'S BOOKS LIKE "THE DOG IN  
20101230080321.000|20101230080323.000|CC1|THE NIGHTTIME" AND THEN BOOKS   
20101230080323.000|20101230080326.000|CC1|THAT STARTED OUT AS ADULT BOOKS 
20101230080326.000|20101230080328.000|CC1|THAT ACQUIRED A SECOND          
20101230080328.000|20101230080330.000|CC1|READERSHIP AMONG YOUNGER READERS
20101230080330.000|20101230080332.000|CC1|SO I HAVE BEEN INTERESTED IN HOW
20101230080332.000|20101230080333.000|CC1|BLURRED THAT BORDER SHRINE      
20101230080333.000|20101230080334.000|CC1|BEGINNING TO BE AND HOW MUCH    
20101230080334.000|20101230080338.000|CC1|INTERESTING WORK THERE IS IN IT.
20101230080338.000|20101230080343.000|CC1|>> LUKA IS HEROON'S YOUNGER

20101230080344.000|20101230080346.000|CC1|>> IT'S THE SAME FATHER, THE    
20101230080346.000|20101230080350.000|CC1|STORY TELLER RASHID AND HIS WIFE
20101230080350.000|20101230080352.000|CC1|SORIYA AND HIS FATHER HAS HIS

20101230080355.000|20101230080356.000|CC1|LIFE IS REAL AND YOU HAVE TO,   
20101230080356.000|20101230080358.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, FACE IT.

20101230080400.000|20101230080404.000|CC1|>> WHAT WAS RASHID KNOWN AS?    
20101230080404.000|20101230080405.000|CC1|THE SHAW OF BLAH.               
20101230080405.000|20101230080407.000|CC1|>> THE SHAW OF BLAH BECAUSE HE  
20101230080407.000|20101230080408.000|CC1|IS A BAD STORY TELLER.          
20101230080408.000|20101230080409.000|CC1|THAT'S A BAD REVIEW.

20101230080440.000|20101230080441.000|CC1|NOT A SEQUEL TO THIS.

20101230080442.000|20101230080444.000|CC1|I THINK THEY STAND ALONE.       
20101230080444.000|20101230080445.000|CC1|I WANTED TO WRITE IT AS A STAND

20101230080507.000|20101230080509.000|CC1|>> THERE ARE ALSO VIDEO GAMES IN
20101230080509.000|20101230080509.000|CC1|THIS.

20101230080513.000|20101230080516.000|CC1|TIME, HAS USED MANY OF THE

20101230080517.000|20101230080519.000|CC1|QUEST NARRATIVE, THE BUSINESS OF
20101230080519.000|20101230080521.000|CC1|LEVELS AND SAVING AND PROCEEDING

20101230080608.000|20101230080610.000|CC1|LUKA, WHERE, IN A SLIP OF THE

20101230080640.000|20101230080641.000|CC1|>> RIGHT.                       
20101230080641.000|20101230080643.000|CC1|FIRST, IT'S MORE FUN, ISN'T IT? 
20101230080643.000|20101230080646.000|CC1|IF IT'S A PARENT SAVING A CHILD,
20101230080646.000|20101230080646.000|CC1|BORING STORY.

20101230080648.000|20101230080649.000|CC1|INTERESTING.

20101230080650.000|20101230080654.000|CC1|THERE IS A SENSE, AN ADULT SENSE
20101230080654.000|20101230080656.000|CC1|THAT WE FEEL THAT OUR CHILDREN

20101230080658.000|20101230080700.000|CC1|>> THE WRITING OF THE BOOKS IN  
20101230080700.000|20101230080702.000|CC1|THE END WAS ABOUT THE JOY OF    
20101230080702.000|20101230080703.000|CC1|YOUR LIFE.                      
20101230080703.000|20101230080704.000|CC1|THEY BROUGHT YOU THE MOST JOY AT
20101230080704.000|20101230080706.000|CC1|THE END OF THE DAY WHEN PUSH

20101230080710.000|20101230080712.000|CC1|MOST JOYFUL BOOKS I HAVE EVER

20101230080714.000|20101230080716.000|CC1|BECAUSE THEY'RE WRITTEN OUT OF  
20101230080716.000|20101230080716.000|CC1|LOVE.

20101230080717.000|20101230080721.000|CC1|>> I UNDERSTAND THAT MILAN GOT

20101230080721.000|20101230080723.000|CC1|>> NOBODY WAS ALLOWED TO SEE IT

20101230080813.000|20101230080815.000|CC1|>> IS RASHID YOU?               
20101230080815.000|20101230080817.000|CC1|>> HE IS TWO PEOPLE.            
20101230080817.000|20101230080818.000|CC1|HE COMES FROM TWO PEOPLE.       
20101230080818.000|20101230080820.000|CC1|YES, OF COURSE HE IS A COMEDY

20101230080823.000|20101230080825.000|CC1|VERSION OF MY DAD.

20101230080826.000|20101230080828.000|CC1|STORY TELLER IN MY LIFE, YOU

20101230080832.000|20101230080834.000|CC1|WOULD TELL BEDTIME STORIES.

20101230080852.000|20101230080854.000|CC1|LIKE AND RASHID IS A LITTLE BIT 
20101230080854.000|20101230080855.000|CC1|BOTH OF US.                     
20101230080855.000|20101230080857.000|CC1|>> DO YOU FEAR GROWING OLD, THE 
20101230080857.000|20101230080858.000|CC1|DIMINISHING POWER OF AGE?       
20101230080858.000|20101230080900.000|CC1|>> I'M NOT CRAZY ABOUT IT.      
20101230080900.000|20101230080903.000|CC1|I HAVE TO SAY, AS THAT GREAT    
20101230080903.000|20101230080906.000|CC1|LINE OF WOODY ALLEN'S, IF HE WAS
20101230080906.000|20101230080908.000|CC1|HAPPY IF HE WOULD LIVE ON       
20101230080908.000|20101230080909.000|CC1|THROUGH HIS MOVIES AND HE SAID, 
20101230080909.000|20101230080912.000|CC1|NO, HE WOULD PREFER TO LIVE ON  
20101230080912.000|20101230080914.000|CC1|THROUGH HIS APARTMENT.          
20101230080914.000|20101230080914.000|CC1|[LAUGHTER]                      
20101230080914.000|20101230080915.000|CC1|THAT'S MY OPINION.              
20101230080915.000|20101230080917.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, I'M NOT IN FAVOR OF   
20101230080917.000|20101230080918.000|CC1|GROWING OLD.                    
20101230080918.000|20101230080920.000|CC1|BUT I DON'T MIND IT EITHER.     
20101230080920.000|20101230080922.000|CC1|YOU JUST HAVE TO ACCEPT WHAT    
20101230080922.000|20101230080923.000|CC1|THERE IS.                       
20101230080923.000|20101230080925.000|CC1|THERE'S A POINT AS AN ARTIST,   
20101230080925.000|20101230080927.000|CC1|THIS POINT IN YOUR LIFE WHEN YOU
20101230080927.000|20101230080928.000|CC1|HAVE DONE A LOT WHERE YOU DO    
20101230080928.000|20101230080931.000|CC1|HAVE TO LOOK HARDER FOR THE NEXT
20101230080931.000|20101230080932.000|CC1|DIRECTION, YOU HAVE TO MAKE SURE
20101230080932.000|20101230080934.000|CC1|YOU'RE NOT JUST REPEATING       
20101230080934.000|20101230080936.000|CC1|YOURSELF AND FIND FRESH         
20101230080936.000|20101230080936.000|CC1|CHALLENGES.                     
20101230080936.000|20101230080939.000|CC1|>> SO WHY HAVE YOU COME NOW TO  
20101230080939.000|20101230080940.000|CC1|WRITING MEMOIR?                 
20101230080940.000|20101230080942.000|CC1|>> IT WAS INSTINCT.             
20101230080942.000|20101230080944.000|CC1|THE TRUTH; AFTER EVERYTHING THAT
20101230080944.000|20101230080947.000|CC1|HAPPENED AROUND "THE SATANIC    
20101230080947.000|20101230080948.000|CC1|VERSES" DURING THOSE YEARS,     
20101230080948.000|20101230080951.000|CC1|THERE WAS A WRITER BIT OF ME    
20101230080951.000|20101230080954.000|CC1|SITTING ON MY SHOULDER THAT WAS 
20101230080954.000|20101230080957.000|CC1|SAYING, GOOD STORY, TAKE NOTES. 
20101230080957.000|20101230080959.000|CC1|BUT THEN FOR LONG TIME AT THE   
20101230080959.000|20101230081001.000|CC1|END OF THAT PERIOD, I DIDN'T    
20101230081001.000|20101230081002.000|CC1|WANT TO WRITE ABOUT IT.         
20101230081002.000|20101230081003.000|CC1|I THOUGHT I WOULD JUST COME OUT 
20101230081003.000|20101230081005.000|CC1|OF IT AND I DON'T WANT TO PUT   
20101230081005.000|20101230081006.000|CC1|MYSELF INTO IT.                 
20101230081006.000|20101230081007.000|CC1|I WANT TO GO BACK TO THE DAY JOB
20101230081007.000|20101230081009.000|CC1|AND I WANT TO WRITE NOVELS.     
20101230081009.000|20101230081011.000|CC1|AND I JUST THOUGHT THERE'S GOING
20101230081011.000|20101230081012.000|CC1|TO COME A TIME WHEN YOU FEEL    
20101230081012.000|20101230081014.000|CC1|READY AND I'M JUST GOING TO     
20101230081014.000|20101230081015.000|CC1|LEAVE IT TO INSTINCT.           
20101230081015.000|20101230081017.000|CC1|>> AND INSTINCT HAS SPOKEN.     
20101230081017.000|20101230081021.000|CC1|>> INSTINCT SPOKE EARLIER THIS  
20101230081021.000|20101230081021.000|CC1|YEAR.                           
20101230081021.000|20101230081022.000|CC1|SOMETHING SAID WHAT DO YOU WANT 
20101230081022.000|20101230081024.000|CC1|TO DO NEXT?                     
20101230081024.000|20101230081026.000|CC1|AND I FOUND MYSELF THINKING WELL
20101230081026.000|20101230081028.000|CC1|MAYBE IT'S TIME TO TELL THAT    
20101230081028.000|20101230081028.000|CC1|STORY.                          
20101230081028.000|20101230081032.000|CC1|SO I HAVE NOW -- MY GUESSTIMATE 
20101230081032.000|20101230081033.000|CC1|I HAVE WRITTEN ABOUT A QUARTER  
20101230081033.000|20101230081033.000|CC1|OF IT.                          
20101230081033.000|20101230081036.000|CC1|>> IT'S A MEMOIRS OF JUST THAT  
20101230081036.000|20101230081036.000|CC1|KIND?                           
20101230081036.000|20101230081036.000|CC1|>> NO.                          
20101230081036.000|20101230081039.000|CC1|>> IT'S A MEMOIR OF LIFE?       
20101230081039.000|20101230081041.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101230081041.000|20101230081042.000|CC1|INITIALLY I THOUGHT I WANTED TO 
20101230081042.000|20101230081043.000|CC1|WRITE ABOUT THAT NINE YEAR      
20101230081043.000|20101230081044.000|CC1|PERIOD.                         
20101230081044.000|20101230081045.000|CC1|BUT I THOUGHT IF I'M GOING TO   
20101230081045.000|20101230081046.000|CC1|TELL THAT TRUTHFULLY I HAVE TO  
20101230081046.000|20101230081048.000|CC1|MAKE ALL OF THE PEOPLE REAL     
20101230081048.000|20101230081050.000|CC1|INCLUDING MYSELF AND THAT MEANS 
20101230081050.000|20101230081051.000|CC1|TELLING THE WHOLE STORY.        
20101230081051.000|20101230081054.000|CC1|I THINK TO THE READER, THE      
20101230081054.000|20101230081055.000|CC1|INTEREST IS ALWAYS THE SAME.    
20101230081055.000|20101230081056.000|CC1|YOU HAVE TO SEE CHARACTERS ON   
20101230081056.000|20101230081058.000|CC1|THE PAGE THAT ARE VIVID AND THAT
20101230081058.000|20101230081059.000|CC1|YOU'RE INTERESTED IN AND YOU    
20101230081059.000|20101230081100.000|CC1|WANT TO KNOW WHAT HAPPENS AND   
20101230081100.000|20101230081101.000|CC1|YOU CARE ABOUT WHAT HAPPENS TO  
20101230081101.000|20101230081102.000|CC1|THEM.                           
20101230081102.000|20101230081104.000|CC1|SO IN A SENSE, IT'S NOVELISTIC  
20101230081104.000|20101230081106.000|CC1|AND I HAVE TO WRITE IT IN THE   
20101230081106.000|20101230081107.000|CC1|SAME WAY I WOULD WRITE A NOVEL. 
20101230081107.000|20101230081110.000|CC1|I HAVE TO WRITE PEOPLE AND MAKE 
20101230081110.000|20101230081112.000|CC1|THEM COME ALIVE ON THE PAGE AND 
20101230081112.000|20101230081113.000|CC1|MAKE THEM PEOPLE THAT YOU WOULD 
20101230081113.000|20101230081116.000|CC1|CARE ABOUT.                     
20101230081116.000|20101230081117.000|CC1|BUT IN A WAY, ONE OF THE REASONS
20101230081117.000|20101230081119.000|CC1|FOR WAITING WAS TO FEEL THAT I  
20101230081119.000|20101230081124.000|CC1|WOULD HAVE THE PROPER WRITER'S  
20101230081124.000|20101230081125.000|CC1|DISTANCE FROM THE MATERIAL AND  
20101230081125.000|20101230081127.000|CC1|COULD APPROACH IT LIKE A WRITING
20101230081127.000|20101230081127.000|CC1|TASK.                           
20101230081127.000|20101230081129.000|CC1|>> Rose: SO THEREFORE THE       
20101230081129.000|20101230081132.000|CC1|QUESTION, HOW NOW DO YOU SEE    
20101230081132.000|20101230081135.000|CC1|THAT INCREDIBLE PERIOD, PERHAPS 
20101230081135.000|20101230081138.000|CC1|DIFFERENTLY THAN YOU SAW IT, AND
20101230081138.000|20101230081142.000|CC1|DID YOU KNOW ABOUT IT --        
20101230081142.000|20101230081145.000|CC1|>> THE THING I INSTINCTIVELY    
20101230081145.000|20101230081146.000|CC1|FELT AT THE TIME THAT NOBODY    
20101230081146.000|20101230081149.000|CC1|ELSE REALLY SAW WAS THIS WAS NOT
20101230081149.000|20101230081150.000|CC1|AN ISO LATE INCIDENT.           
20101230081150.000|20101230081153.000|CC1|A LOT OF PEOPLE TREATED IT, EVEN
20101230081153.000|20101230081154.000|CC1|PEOPLE -- EITHER PEOPLE ON MY   
20101230081154.000|20101230081155.000|CC1|SIDE OR AGAINST --              
20101230081155.000|20101230081156.000|CC1|>> I DON'T THINK PEOPLE         
20101230081156.000|20101230081158.000|CC1|UNDERSTOOD IT UNTIL IT CAME     
20101230081158.000|20101230081200.000|CC1|ALONG WITH YOU AND SAID, OK,    
20101230081200.000|20101230081202.000|CC1|THIS IS SOMETHING THAT EXISTS   
20101230081202.000|20101230081203.000|CC1|AND WHAT'S IT ABOUT?            
20101230081203.000|20101230081205.000|CC1|>> BUT VERY FEW PEOPLE WANTED TO
20101230081205.000|20101230081208.000|CC1|SEE IT AS ONE INCIDENT AMONG    
20101230081208.000|20101230081208.000|CC1|MANY.                           
20101230081208.000|20101230081212.000|CC1|IT WAS SEEN AS AN ISOLATED      
20101230081212.000|20101230081212.000|CC1|THING.                          
20101230081212.000|20101230081214.000|CC1|ONE OF THE THINGS I TRIED DO AT 
20101230081214.000|20101230081216.000|CC1|THE TIME, THERE WAS A LARGER    
20101230081216.000|20101230081216.000|CC1|PROBLEM.                        
20101230081216.000|20101230081218.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, IT WASN'T JUST ME BUT 
20101230081218.000|20101230081221.000|CC1|THE ATTACKS ON OTHER WRITERS, ON
20101230081221.000|20101230081225.000|CC1|INDIVIDUAL FREEDOMS, AND SO ON, 
20101230081225.000|20101230081227.000|CC1|INSIDE THIS RADICAL ISLAMIC     
20101230081227.000|20101230081230.000|CC1|WORLD, IT WAS VERY WIDESPREAD   
20101230081230.000|20101230081231.000|CC1|AND OFTEN USING THE SAME        
20101230081231.000|20101230081233.000|CC1|LANGUAGE USED AGAINST MY BOOK   
20101230081233.000|20101230081235.000|CC1|BUT MUCH LESS PUBLICIZED BECAUSE
20101230081235.000|20101230081236.000|CC1|THEY WERE HAPPENING IN ARAB     
20101230081236.000|20101230081237.000|CC1|COUNTRIES.                      
20101230081237.000|20101230081239.000|CC1|>> SO WHAT DID YOU FIND OUT,    
20101230081239.000|20101230081241.000|CC1|WITHOUT TALKING ABOUT A         
20101230081241.000|20101230081243.000|CC1|PARTICULAR INDIVIDUAL, I KNOW   
20101230081243.000|20101230081245.000|CC1|CHRIS HITCHENS SAID TO ME WHEN  
20101230081245.000|20101230081247.000|CC1|HE THINKS ABOUT HIS LIFE, ONE OF
20101230081247.000|20101230081249.000|CC1|THE PROUD MOMENTS IS THAT HE WAS
20101230081249.000|20101230081249.000|CC1|THERE FOR YOU.                  
20101230081249.000|20101230081251.000|CC1|>> THE THING I FEEL VERY MOVED  
20101230081251.000|20101230081253.000|CC1|BY IS THE WAY IN WHICH MY       
20101230081253.000|20101230081255.000|CC1|FRIENDS MOVED CLOSER TO ME AND  
20101230081255.000|20101230081257.000|CC1|STOOD BESIDE ME AND HELPED ME   
20101230081257.000|20101230081258.000|CC1|THROUGH THAT.                   
20101230081258.000|20101230081259.000|CC1|AND CHRISTOPHER HITCHENS WAS ONE
20101230081259.000|20101230081301.000|CC1|OF THE PEOPLE WHO UNDOUBTEDLY   
20101230081301.000|20101230081302.000|CC1|DID THAT.                       
20101230081302.000|20101230081304.000|CC1|AND CERTAINLY AT THE POINT --   
20101230081304.000|20101230081307.000|CC1|THERE WAS A KEY MOMENT WHEN UP  
20101230081307.000|20101230081308.000|CC1|FINALLY WAS ABLE TO GET A       
20101230081308.000|20101230081309.000|CC1|MEETING WITH PRESIDENT CLINTON, 
20101230081309.000|20101230081311.000|CC1|WHICH IS THE FIRST TIME THE     
20101230081311.000|20101230081313.000|CC1|AMERICAN ADMINISTRATION HAD EVER
20101230081313.000|20101230081314.000|CC1|TAKEN AN INTEREST.              
20101230081314.000|20101230081316.000|CC1|CHRISTOPHER WAS VERY KNEE       
20101230081316.000|20101230081317.000|CC1|PUSHING FOR THAT MEETING,       
20101230081317.000|20101230081319.000|CC1|TALKING TO PEOPLE HE KNEW INSIDE
20101230081319.000|20101230081321.000|CC1|THE ADMINISTRATION AND THEN --  
20101230081321.000|20101230081323.000|CC1|HE WASN'T THE ONLY PERSON.      
20101230081323.000|20101230081325.000|CC1|>> TONY BLAIR WAS TOO.          
20101230081325.000|20101230081327.000|CC1|>> BLAIR WAS TRYING TO MAKE IT  
20101230081327.000|20101230081328.000|CC1|HAPPEN, TOO.                    
20101230081328.000|20101230081330.000|CC1|THE BRITISH AMBASSADOR, ETC. SO 
20101230081330.000|20101230081331.000|CC1|THERE WERE A GROUP OF PEOPLE.   
20101230081331.000|20101230081334.000|CC1|BUT OF MY FRIENDS, CHRISTOPHER  
20101230081334.000|20101230081335.000|CC1|WAS VERY CONNECTED IN WASHINGTON
20101230081335.000|20101230081338.000|CC1|AND HE USED EVERYTHING HE HAD IN
20101230081338.000|20101230081340.000|CC1|ORDER TO TRY BRING ABOUT WHAT HE
20101230081340.000|20101230081341.000|CC1|FELT NEEDED TO HAPPEN.          
20101230081341.000|20101230081345.000|CC1|AND I MEAN, YOU NOTICE YOUR     
20101230081345.000|20101230081345.000|CC1|FRIENDS NEED.                   
20101230081345.000|20101230081349.000|CC1|>> YOU HAVE ALSO SAID SOMETHING 
20101230081349.000|20101230081350.000|CC1|VERY INTERESTING, THAT YOUR     
20101230081350.000|20101230081352.000|CC1|SENSE OF RESPECT FOR THE BRAVE  
20101230081352.000|20101230081354.000|CC1|PEOPLE THAT STOOD IN LINE TO BUY
20101230081354.000|20101230081356.000|CC1|SATANIC VERSES, THAT THEY       
20101230081356.000|20101230081357.000|CC1|SOMEHOW HAD A KIND OF COURAGE.  
20101230081357.000|20101230081359.000|CC1|>> I THINK THAT THERE WAS, YOU  
20101230081359.000|20101230081401.000|CC1|KNOW, A GENERAL, VERY WIDESPREAD
20101230081401.000|20101230081403.000|CC1|REACTION AMONGST JUST ORDINARY  
20101230081403.000|20101230081405.000|CC1|PEOPLE THAT THEY DIDN'T FEEL    
20101230081405.000|20101230081406.000|CC1|LIKE BEING TOLD WHAT THEY COULD 
20101230081406.000|20101230081408.000|CC1|READ AND WHAT THEY COULDN'T READ

20101230081412.000|20101230081413.000|CC1|A FAR AWAY COUNTRY.             
20101230081413.000|20101230081415.000|CC1|AND I THINK THE PEOPLE DID STAND
20101230081415.000|20101230081418.000|CC1|UP FOR THAT BOOK AS A POINT OF  
20101230081418.000|20101230081420.000|CC1|PRINCIPAL, NOT JUST READERS BUT 
20101230081420.000|20101230081424.000|CC1|PEOPLE WORKING IN STORES AND    
20101230081424.000|20101230081425.000|CC1|PUBLISHING COMPANIES.           
20101230081425.000|20101230081427.000|CC1|THERE WAS A COLLECTIVE PRINCIPLE
20101230081427.000|20101230081429.000|CC1|AND I FEEL PROUD TO HAVE BEEN   
20101230081429.000|20101230081430.000|CC1|INVOLVED IN THAT.               
20101230081430.000|20101230081432.000|CC1|>> Rose: WERE WERE THE PEOPLE   
20101230081432.000|20101230081434.000|CC1|THAT SAID OH, I CAN'T, I'M      
20101230081434.000|20101230081435.000|CC1|SORRY, I CAN'T BE THERE FOR YOU.
20101230081435.000|20101230081438.000|CC1|>> THERE WERE A FEW.            
20101230081438.000|20101230081439.000|CC1|THERE WEREN'T THAT MANY.        
20101230081439.000|20101230081440.000|CC1|BUT THERE WERE A FEW.           
20101230081440.000|20101230081441.000|CC1|THERE WAS A CERTAIN FEELING THAT
20101230081441.000|20101230081444.000|CC1|MAYBE I HAD BROUGHT IT ON MYSELF
20101230081444.000|20101230081445.000|CC1|AND DESERVED EVERYTHING I GOT.  
20101230081445.000|20101230081447.000|CC1|>> ANYBODY EVER TELL YOU THAT?  
20101230081447.000|20101230081447.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101230081447.000|20101230081448.000|CC1|>> DID THEY REALLY?             
20101230081448.000|20101230081449.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101230081449.000|20101230081450.000|CC1|A FEW PEOPLE HERE.              
20101230081450.000|20101230081453.000|CC1|>> AND ISLAM ITSELF TODAY --    
20101230081453.000|20101230081455.000|CC1|>> I KNOW.                      
20101230081455.000|20101230081456.000|CC1|THAT'S A BIG SUBJECT.           
20101230081456.000|20101230081459.000|CC1|>> BUT I THINK FOR ME TO ANSWER 
20101230081459.000|20101230081501.000|CC1|IN ONE SENTENCE, THE INTERESTING
20101230081501.000|20101230081505.000|CC1|THING IS THE WAR NOT BETWEEN THE
20101230081505.000|20101230081507.000|CC1|ISLAM AND THE WEST BUT LOOK WHAT
20101230081507.000|20101230081509.000|CC1|HAPPENED IN IRAN AFTER THE LAST 
20101230081509.000|20101230081511.000|CC1|ELECTION, YOU CAN SEE A WHOLE   
20101230081511.000|20101230081512.000|CC1|GENERATION OF YOUNG PEOPLE, YOU 
20101230081512.000|20101230081515.000|CC1|KNOW, REJECTED THAT VERY        
20101230081515.000|20101230081517.000|CC1|CONSERVATIVE, REPRESSIVE,       
20101230081517.000|20101230081520.000|CC1|INHIBITING REGIME, THAT THEY ARE
20101230081520.000|20101230081520.000|CC1|STUCK WITH.                     
20101230081520.000|20101230081523.000|CC1|AND I THINK IF YOU LOOK ACROSS  
20101230081523.000|20101230081524.000|CC1|THE MUSLIM WORLD YOU WILL SEE   
20101230081524.000|20101230081524.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20101230081524.000|20101230081526.000|CC1|YOU WILL SEE A YOUNGER          
20101230081526.000|20101230081528.000|CC1|GENERATION THAT REALLY DOESN'T  
20101230081528.000|20101230081529.000|CC1|WANT THAT WORLD.                
20101230081529.000|20101230081531.000|CC1|>> THEY WANT A MODERN ISLAM.    
20101230081531.000|20101230081533.000|CC1|>> THEY WANT A MORE OPEN        
20101230081533.000|20101230081533.000|CC1|SOCIETY.                        
20101230081533.000|20101230081535.000|CC1|THEY WANT THE SOCIETY IN WHICH  
20101230081535.000|20101230081536.000|CC1|THEY CAN BE THE PEOPLE THEY     
20101230081536.000|20101230081537.000|CC1|CHOOSE TO BE RATHER THAN THE    
20101230081537.000|20101230081540.000|CC1|PEOPLE -- RATHER THAN BE FORCED 
20101230081540.000|20101230081543.000|CC1|INTO THE VERY NARROW WORLD THAT 
20101230081543.000|20101230081545.000|CC1|THEY ARE OBLIGED TO.            
20101230081545.000|20101230081545.000|CC1|>>                              
20101230081545.000|20101230081548.000|CC1|>> Rose: THERE'S ALWAYS THIS    
20101230081548.000|20101230081550.000|CC1|THING THAT PERPLEXED ME.        
20101230081550.000|20101230081552.000|CC1|IT IS SOMETIMES SAID AS THE WEST
20101230081552.000|20101230081554.000|CC1|VERSUS ISLAM WHICH IS LIKE      
20101230081554.000|20101230081556.000|CC1|GEOGRAPHY VERSUS A RELIGION.    
20101230081556.000|20101230081556.000|CC1|IT DOESN'T MAKE SENSE.          
20101230081556.000|20101230081558.000|CC1|>> IT DOESN'T MAKE SENSE.       
20101230081558.000|20101230081601.000|CC1|AND I THINK THAT THERE OBVIOUSLY
20101230081601.000|20101230081603.000|CC1|IS A KIND OF RADICAL ISLAM THAT 
20101230081603.000|20101230081605.000|CC1|IS OPPOSED TO AN IDEA OF THE    
20101230081605.000|20101230081608.000|CC1|WEST AND WISHES TO ATTACK IT.   
20101230081608.000|20101230081610.000|CC1|>> WHAT IDEA OF THE WEST IS IT  
20101230081610.000|20101230081612.000|CC1|THAT THAT WING OF ISLAM IS      
20101230081612.000|20101230081613.000|CC1|OPPOSED TO?                     
20101230081613.000|20101230081619.000|CC1|>> IMPERIALIST, OPPRESSIVE, YOU 
20101230081619.000|20101230081621.000|CC1|KNOW, AND THE POWER CENTER THAT 
20101230081621.000|20101230081624.000|CC1|THEY NEED TO OVERTHROW.         
20101230081624.000|20101230081625.000|CC1|>> IT'S ABOUT POWER THOUGH.     
20101230081625.000|20101230081628.000|CC1|IN THE END IT'S ABOUT POWER.    
20101230081628.000|20101230081629.000|CC1|WITH GROUPS LIKE AL QAEDA, IT'S 
20101230081629.000|20101230081631.000|CC1|NO TO THE BRING ABOUT A HOLIER  
20101230081631.000|20101230081631.000|CC1|WORLD.                          
20101230081631.000|20101230081632.000|CC1|IT'S ABOUT TO BRING ABOUT A     
20101230081632.000|20101230081634.000|CC1|WORLD THAT THEY'RE IN CONTROL   
20101230081634.000|20101230081635.000|CC1|OF.                             
20101230081635.000|20101230081637.000|CC1|IT'S NOT ABOUT FAITH; IT'S ABOUT
20101230081637.000|20101230081637.000|CC1|POWER.                          
20101230081637.000|20101230081639.000|CC1|AND I THINK IT'S IMPORTANT TO   
20101230081639.000|20101230081639.000|CC1|UNDERSTAND --                   
20101230081639.000|20101230081641.000|CC1|>> DOES THE KORAN HAVE TO POWER?
20101230081641.000|20101230081645.000|CC1|>> KORAN IS LIKE ANY HOLY BOOK; 
20101230081645.000|20101230081647.000|CC1|IT CONTRADICTS ITSELF.          
20101230081647.000|20101230081650.000|CC1|YOU CAN FIND IN THE KORAN TEXTS 
20101230081650.000|20101230081652.000|CC1|OF GREAT TOLERANCE AND OTHERS   
20101230081652.000|20101230081654.000|CC1|THAT SOUND PRETTY INTOLERANT.   
20101230081654.000|20101230081655.000|CC1|>> WHICH PROMOTE CONFLICT.      
20101230081655.000|20101230081657.000|CC1|>> AND THE OLD TESTAMENT, TOO,  
20101230081657.000|20101230081659.000|CC1|YOU CAN FIND IN THESE BOOKS THE 
20101230081659.000|20101230081701.000|CC1|TEXT THAT JUSTIFY THE POINT OF  
20101230081701.000|20101230081702.000|CC1|VIEW YOU HAPPEN TO HAVE ALREADY.
20101230081702.000|20101230081710.000|CC1|>> SO WHEN YOU LOOK AT THE      
20101230081710.000|20101230081712.000|CC1|CONFLICT TODAY, WILL CHANGE COME
20101230081712.000|20101230081713.000|CC1|FROM SPHWHIM.                   
20101230081713.000|20101230081714.000|CC1|>> THE TRUTH IS, I DON'T KNOW.  
20101230081714.000|20101230081720.000|CC1|I DO FEEL THAT THE WOMEN ARE THE
20101230081720.000|20101230081725.000|CC1|MOST UNIFORMLY OPPRESSED GROUP  
20101230081725.000|20101230081727.000|CC1|IN THE ISLAMIC WORLD AND THEY   
20101230081727.000|20101230081728.000|CC1|HAVE A KEY PROBLEM.             
20101230081728.000|20101230081730.000|CC1|>> IF YOU GO FROM COUNTRY TO

20101230081806.000|20101230081810.000|CC1|BE ACTIVE SO TO SPEAK, WHICH ARE

20101230081822.000|20101230081824.000|CC1|AZTECS AND THE NOR DICK

20101230081825.000|20101230081826.000|CC1|THE WORLD IS FULL OF DEAD       
20101230081826.000|20101230081826.000|CC1|RELIGIONS.

20101230081830.000|20101230081832.000|CC1|THAT YOU CAN THEN BELIEVE IN

20101230082516.000|20101230082516.000|CC1|UNFAIR.

20101230082518.000|20101230082521.000|CC1|TABLE AND SAYING, THIS IS AN    
20101230082521.000|20101230082521.000|CC1|OUTRAGE.                        
20101230082521.000|20101230082523.000|CC1|A KID SHOULDN'T HAVE TO WIN THE 
20101230082523.000|20101230082527.000|CC1|LOTTERY TO HAVE A SCHOOL.       
20101230082527.000|20101230082530.000|CC1|TO HAVE A GREAT SCHOOL.
